thread.section_title: Goldcar opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Goldcar | www.goldcar.com | 2 de 698
thread.title: Morten Als Pedersen
thread.title_full: Goldcar evaluado por Morten Als Pedersen

author: Morten Als Pedersen
title: Morten Als Pedersen
text:
Goldcar has drawn illegal fees from my Mastercard. They have invented a "Diesel Fee"on 12 EURO that they have taken.
Also I asked to pay in EURO but they have deducted the money in DKK.
Finally they charged 40 EURO from each of the 10 customers that were on a plane that was 10 minutes late. I accept there may be a fee but 400 Euro is piracy!
I have contacted them several times but they have not returned the money.
